title: brand new Pixel 3a XL restarted itself many times today
content:
Just got a brand new Google Pixel 3a XL two days ago. Worked fine till today - it restarted 5 times by itself.
Battery was >80%. Android OS updated to latest. All apps are up to date.
I followed some online suggestions - e.g., tried Safe mode - it didn't reboot in safe mode but guess I didn't test it long enough.

This never happened in my old Pixel (1st gen).I'm wondering if it's a defective unit (hardware)?

TIA
